name: Lone Star Outlaw Legend: Cowboy Ranger Old Wild West Shooter
name_original: Lone Star Outlaw Legend: Cowboy Ranger Old Wild West Shooter
description:
It's a free for all in the wild west and it's your job to stop the bad guys!

Lone Star Outlaw Legend is a FREE, simple and addicting game that's fun for all ages. You must ride your cowboy through the wild west collecting back the gold that robbers have stolen. But beware - there are enemies along the way!

How long can you keep going on your trusty horse and avoid the bandits? How many coins can you collect along the way? You'll start riding faster and faster, so watch out for those wanted criminals!

Collect enough coins and you can unlock more characters for even more fun!


*** FEATURES ***

* Incredible endless gameplay means a new game every time
* Collect coins to unlock more characters
* Simple game controls good for both kids and adults
* Amazing graphics
* Game Center enabled
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch


Download Lone Star Outlaw Legend right now while it's 100% FREE!
